title: Channel Systems Engineer
description:
Our Mission
At Palo Alto Networks® everything starts and ends with our mission:
Being the cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting our digital way of life.
Our vision is a world where each day is safer and more secure than the one before. We are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done, and we’re looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we are.
Who We Are
We take our mission of protecting the digital way of life seriously. We are relentless in protecting our customers and we believe that the unique ideas of every member of our team contributes to our collective success. Our values were crowdsourced by employees and are brought to life through each of us everyday - from disruptive innovation and collaboration, to execution. From showing up for each other with integrity to creating an environment where we all feel included.
As a member of our team, you will be shaping the future of cybersecurity. We work fast, value ongoing learning, and we respect each employee as a unique individual. Knowing we all have different needs, our development and personal wellbeing programs are designed to give you choice in how you are supported. This includes our FLEXBenefits wellbeing spending account with over 1,000 eligible items selected by employees, our mental and financial health resources, and our personalized learning opportunities - just to name a few!
Job Description
Your Career
As a Palo Alto Networks Channel Systems Engineer, you are a critical part of the sales team; it is your responsibility to build solutions and enable the partner, work with a partner to build a strong services practice, align and build relationships between the partner and Palo Alto Networks, and finally build joint value by demonstrating the partner’s strengths.
You will represent the company as a technical advisor tasked with building excitement and support for the company with the partner’s sales and technical teams. You will travel and take ownership of the technical relationship with our channel partners to demo, train, enable, communicate with and continually engage technical partner team members by dedicatedly managing and delivering technical content and establishing relationships either onsite, online, and via telephone. You will have specific recruitment, enablement, training and communication objectives aligned with the objectives of the company.
Your Impact
  • Ability to align partner needs and strategy with the value of Palo Alto Networks
  • Provide product demos on all aspects of the Palo Alto Networks Platform
  • Provide technical enablement and training to strategic/national partners
  • Strategically position Palo Alto Networks with other technologies sold by partners
  • Participate in partner business planning activities by supporting the development and execution of the partner technical business plan
  • Facilitate the planning and preparation of partner Sales Engineers (SEs) in achieving Palo Alto Networks and industry certifications
  • Oversee partner pre-sales activities, including competitive analysis, test plans, demos, proofs of concept, and RFPs
  • Cross-communicate Palo Alto Networks and partner value propositions, especially between partner and Palo Alto Networks field SEs
  • Understand and effectively present the Palo Alto Networks’ security platform
  • Create, execute, and review a technical readiness plan with the CBM/regional sales team, including measurable achievements to track progress
  • Provide localized technical training to partner’s pre-sales and post-sales technical resources
  • Support product/service training of the partner sales teams
  • Educate and promote the use of Palo Alto Networks support model and effective use of available resources
  • Collaborate with the CBM/regional sales team on the development and management of the channel partner business plan and mutual action plans
  • Understand and communicate the business advantages of a partnership with Palo Alto Networks
  • Develop a strong understanding of Palo Alto Networks’ channel partner objectives
Qualifications
Your Experience
  • General understanding of local/national partner community, technology trends, and competitive landscape
  • Fluent language skills in Portuguese, Spanish and English
  • Experience working in a technical capacity with Service Providers / Telco's
  • Strong communication and listening skills, including effective delivery of presentations
  • Ability to write and speak clearly and precisely, and structure information logically for digestion
  • Ability to ask questions to clarify situations before acting or making decisions
  • An understanding of how to qualify partner needs to create accord
  • Flexible and adaptable self-starter with strong relationship-building skills
  • Intellectual curiosity, humility, accountability, and positive approach
  • Experience as a SE or Systems Integrator
  • Demonstrable experience with systems installation, configuration, and administration of routers/switches, UNIX/Linux and Windows-based systems (prior Active Directory/LDAP experience desirable)
  • Experience emphasizing L2-L4 Networking (L2 Switching architectures including Spanning Tree, VLANs/trunking, IP routing including static routes, OSPF and BGP, route redistribution, L4 Load-balancing)
  • Industry knowledge of security and network product and technology trends
  • Knowledge of competitive solutions and selling strategies
  • Experience selling, demonstrating, installing or troubleshooting network security products
  • Modern datacenter and public cloud infrastructure and technology is preferred
  • Modern network threats and malware is preferred
  • Network forensics and incident response is preferred
  • Automation and orchestration tools and Endpoint security products technologies is preferred
  • Relevant industry certifications – Eg. SANS, CISSP, CCIE, etc is preferred
Additional Information
The Team
As part of our Systems Engineering team, you’ll support the sales team with technical expertise and guidance when establishing trust with key clients. You won’t find someone at Palo Alto Networks that isn’t committed to your success – with everyone pitching in to assist when it comes to solutions selling, learning, and development. As a member of our systems engineering team, you are motivated by a solutions-focused sales environment and find fulfillment in working with clients to resolve incredible complex cyberthreats.
Our Commitment
We’re problem solvers that take risks and challenge cybersecurity’s status quo. It’s simple: we can’t accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating, together.
We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for all qualified individuals with a disability. If you require assistance or accommodation due to a disability or special need, please contact us at
Palo Alto Networks is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity in our workplace, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or other legally protected characteristics.
All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

At Palo Alto Networks® everything starts and ends with our mission:
Being the cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting our digital way of life.
Our vision is a world where each day is safer and more secure than the one before. We are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done, and we’re looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we are.
Who We Are
We take our mission of protecting the digital way of life seriously. We are relentless in protecting our customers and we believe that the unique ideas of every member of our team contributes to our collective success. Our values were crowdsourced by employees and are brought to life through each of us everyday - from disruptive innovation and collaboration, to execution. From showing up for each other with integrity to creating an environment where we all feel included.
As a member of our team, you will be shaping the future of cybersecurity. We work fast, value ongoing learning, and we respect each employee as a unique individual. Knowing we all have different needs, our development and personal wellbeing programs are designed to give you choice in how you are supported. This includes our FLEXBenefits wellbeing spending account with over 1,000 eligible items selected by employees, our mental and financial health resources, and our personalized learning opportunities - just to name a few!
Job Description
Your Career
As a Palo Alto Networks Channel Systems Engineer, you are a critical part of the sales team; it is your responsibility to build solutions and enable the partner, work with a partner to build a strong services practice, align and build relationships between the partner and Palo Alto Networks, and finally build joint value by demonstrating the partner’s strengths.
You will represent the company as a technical advisor tasked with building excitement and support for the company with the partner’s sales and technical teams. You will travel and take ownership of the technical relationship with our channel partners to demo, train, enable, communicate with and continually engage technical partner team members by dedicatedly managing and delivering technical content and establishing relationships either onsite, online, and via telephone. You will have specific recruitment, enablement, training and communication objectives aligned with the objectives of the company.
Your Impact
  • Ability to align partner needs and strategy with the value of Palo Alto Networks
  • Provide product demos on all aspects of the Palo Alto Networks Platform
  • Provide technical enablement and training to strategic/national partners
  • Strategically position Palo Alto Networks with other technologies sold by partners
  • Participate in partner business planning activities by supporting the development and execution of the partner technical business plan
  • Facilitate the planning and preparation of partner Sales Engineers (SEs) in achieving Palo Alto Networks and industry certifications
  • Oversee partner pre-sales activities, including competitive analysis, test plans, demos, proofs of concept, and RFPs
  • Cross-communicate Palo Alto Networks and partner value propositions, especially between partner and Palo Alto Networks field SEs
  • Understand and effectively present the Palo Alto Networks’ security platform
  • Create, execute, and review a technical readiness plan with the CBM/regional sales team, including measurable achievements to track progress
  • Provide localized technical training to partner’s pre-sales and post-sales technical resources
  • Support product/service training of the partner sales teams
  • Educate and promote the use of Palo Alto Networks support model and effective use of available resources
  • Collaborate with the CBM/regional sales team on the development and management of the channel partner business plan and mutual action plans
  • Understand and communicate the business advantages of a partnership with Palo Alto Networks
  • Develop a strong understanding of Palo Alto Networks’ channel partner objectives
Qualifications
Your Experience
  • General understanding of local/national partner community, technology trends, and competitive landscape
  • Fluent language skills in Portuguese, Spanish and English
  • Experience working in a technical capacity with Service Providers / Telco's
  • Strong communication and listening skills, including effective delivery of presentations
  • Ability to write and speak clearly and precisely, and structure information logically for digestion
  • Ability to ask questions to clarify situations before acting or making decisions
  • An understanding of how to qualify partner needs to create accord
  • Flexible and adaptable self-starter with strong relationship-building skills
  • Intellectual curiosity, humility, accountability, and positive approach
  • Experience as a SE or Systems Integrator
  • Demonstrable experience with systems installation, configuration, and administration of routers/switches, UNIX/Linux and Windows-based systems (prior Active Directory/LDAP experience desirable)
  • Experience emphasizing L2-L4 Networking (L2 Switching architectures including Spanning Tree, VLANs/trunking, IP routing including static routes, OSPF and BGP, route redistribution, L4 Load-balancing)
  • Industry knowledge of security and network product and technology trends
  • Knowledge of competitive solutions and selling strategies
  • Experience selling, demonstrating, installing or troubleshooting network security products
  • Modern datacenter and public cloud infrastructure and technology is preferred
  • Modern network threats and malware is preferred
  • Network forensics and incident response is preferred
  • Automation and orchestration tools and Endpoint security products technologies is preferred
  • Relevant industry certifications – Eg. SANS, CISSP, CCIE, etc is preferred
Additional Information
The Team
As part of our Systems Engineering team, you’ll support the sales team with technical expertise and guidance when establishing trust with key clients. You won’t find someone at Palo Alto Networks that isn’t committed to your success – with everyone pitching in to assist when it comes to solutions selling, learning, and development. As a member of our systems engineering team, you are motivated by a solutions-focused sales environment and find fulfillment in working with clients to resolve incredible complex cyberthreats.
Our Commitment
We’re problem solvers that take risks and challenge cybersecurity’s status quo. It’s simple: we can’t accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating, together.
We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for all qualified individuals with a disability. If you require assistance or accommodation due to a disability or special need, please contact us at
Palo Alto Networks is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity in our workplace, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or other legally protected characteristics.
All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

title: Senior Mainframe Systems Analyst
description:
Venha para uma das maiores empresas de Serviços IT do mundo!! Aqui você pode transformar sua carreira!

Por que fazer parte da TCS? Aqui na TCS acreditamos que as pessoas fazem a diferença, por isso vivemos uma cultura de aprendizado ilimitado cheio de oportunidades de melhorias e desenvolvimento mútuo. O cenário ideal para expandir ideias através das ferramentas certas, contribuindo para nosso sucesso num ambiente colaborativo.

Procuramos (nome do cargo) que queira aprender e transformar sua carreira.


Buscamos um "Senior Mainframe System Analyst " in Londrina(Onsite) para atuar no desenho, desenvolvimento e manutenção de soluções robustas em ambiente Mainframe. Este profissional será responsável por analisar requisitos, propor soluções técnicas, executar testes e documentar os sistemas com foco em eficiência, desempenho e escalabilidade. A atuação será colaborativa com diferentes áreas de negócio e tecnologia, em projetos de metodologias Ágeis (SCRUM) ou Cascata.


Nesta função você irá: (responsabilidades)


* Levantar e analisar requisitos técnicos e de negócio

* Projetar e desenvolver soluções Mainframe utilizando COBOL, CICS, JCL, DB2, VSAM, IMS-DB, TSO, CHANGEMAN, Hexasion, JIRA e z/OS

* Realizar testes Unitários e Integrados, investigar falhas e implementar correções, gerar massas de dados, acompanhar homologação e implantações em produção

*Disponibilidade para atender incidentes em ambiente de produção/Integrado

* Documentar processos, soluções e manuais técnicos

* Modelar dados e mapear processos de negócio

* Avaliar desempenho dos sistemas e propor melhorias

* Pesquisar novas tecnologias aplicáveis ao ambiente Mainframe

* Colaborar com equipes multifuncionais e stakeholders

O que você pode esperar de nós?

Desenvolvimento profissional e evolução constante das suas competências, sempre de acordo com os seus interesses.

Oportunidades para trabalho fora do Brasil

Um ambiente colaborativo, diverso e inovador, que incentiva o trabalho em equipe.


O que oferecemos?

Benefícios TCS – Brasil:

Plano de Saúde

Plano Odontológico

Seguro de Vida

Vale Transporte

Vale Refeição/Alimentação

Auxílio Creche

Gympass

TCS Cares – 0800 gratuito que fornece assistência psicológica (24 hrs/dia), jurídica, social e financeira aos associados

Parceria com SESC

Reembolso de Certificações

Portal de aprendizagem gratuito da TCS – cursos online e treinamentos ao vivo

Oportunidade de experiência internacional

Parceria de Descontos com Universidades e Escolas de Idiomas

Bring Your Buddy – Ao indicar pessoas você se torna elegível a receber um bônus para cada contratação

TCS Gems – Reconhecimento por performance

Xcelerate – Plataforma de carreira com mentoria gratuita


Na TATA Consultancy Services promovemos uma cultura inclusiva, trabalhamos sempre pela equidade. Isso se aplica em Gênero, Pessoas com Deficiência, LGBTQIA+, Religião, Raça, Etnia, ou seja, todas as nossas oportunidades são trabalhadas com esses princípios. Pensamos em ações diversas de inclusão e de responsabilidade social, a fim de construir uma TCS que respeita a individualidade. Seja um TCSer!


#Buildingonbelief

ID: 10030338

title: Finance Analyst - Remote
description:
Recognized as the leading software development company in the Americas, our client offers 100% remote modality and an excellent work environment where employees can thrive, and work in multicultural teams, with flexible schedules and endless growth opportunities.


About the Role:


We are seeking a Finance Analyst to join our team and help drive our growth. As a Finance Analyst, you will play a critical and active role in the day-to-day operations. This is an excellent opportunity to be one of the key members of our team and position yourself for unique career growth opportunities.

What You’ll Do:


- Perform research and gather documentation to compile comprehensive reports delivering operational reports, and transactional tasks.

- Work with banking/financial entities, international agencies, or government officials.

- Assist in vendor and client registration, purchasing, and accounts payable processes.

- Data processing: responsible for updating records in the company system.

- Assist in the department's programs, projects, and processes.

- Assist in the preparation of monthly financial reports.

- Assist in tracking due dates and compliance with US tax returns and other legal requirements.


Here’s what we are looking for:


- 3+ years of experience working in finance areas.

- Expertise with web-based tools.

- Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

- Interpersonal and presentation skills.

- Organized and detail-oriented.

- Proven organizational skills.

- Advanced English, both spoken and written (a must).


Benefits:


- 100% remote work.

- Flexible hours - make your own schedule!

- Diverse and multicultural work environment.

- Paid parental leave, vacation & holidays.

- Hardware setup for you to work from home.

- Excellent compensation — well above the market average.

- Extensive opportunities for growth and professional development thanks to our mentoring system.


Enjoy the opportunity to have a dynamic lifestyle, better health, and wellness. Find renewed passion in your job, improve your productivity, and benefit from attractive growth opportunities for your career.


If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: PMO Sênior
description:
Uma empresa dinâmica com uma forte cultura empreendedora


A KLB Group nasceu para descobrir que muitos projetos não alcançaram o sucesso esperado devido à falta de uma abordagem realista, operacional e pragmática. Por mais de vinte anos, nosso objetivo é construir e crescer um grupo capaz de acompanhar nossos clientes, realizando plenamente seus projetos e permitindo que eles alcancem seus objetivos. Para isso, nossos colaboradores estão sempre no centro, colocando os valores de autonomia, dinamismo e ética à frente.


Garantimos o sucesso dos projetos de nossos clientes por meio da valorização e mobilização do nosso capital humano e da contribuição de uma combinação de habilidades essenciais no atual ambiente econômico: Experiência, Reatividade e Flexibilidade.Nosso posicionamento é essencialmente operacional, não apenas aconselhamos, mas implementamos os projetos de nossos clientes na França, Espanha e outros países no exterior. Ao ingressar no KLB Group, você fará parte de um grupo internacional em crescimento, um verdadeiro acelerador de sua carreira. Em um ambiente dinâmico e inovador, apoiaremos o rápido desenvolvimento de suas habilidades graças à nossa gestão e às ferramentas certas. Se você gosta de desafios, quer aproveitar suas habilidades e viver uma aventura humana, não hesite, entre em contato conosco!


A KLB Group está procurando um PMO Sênior para sua atuação em São Paulo - Brasil.


Profissional com idioma coreano fluente


Atuação 100% presencial no bairro do Morumbi, zona sul de São Paulo/SP


Contratação PJ


Objetivo do cargo:

Buscamos um profissional nível Sênior para atuar como PMO em projetos de tecnologia, com foco em ambientes SAP e integrações entre sistemas.

Essa pessoa será responsável pelo acompanhamento de cronogramas, consolidação de status de atividades, interação com stakeholders globais e suporte

à governança dos projetos.

A posição exige fluência em inglês, experiência em projetos SAP, e bons conhecimentos de TI — especialmente no que se refere a integração de sistemas (ERP ↔ sistemas locais).


Requisitos Obrigatórios:

  • Inglês fluente (mandatório, uso frequente em reuniões),
  • Relatório e comunicação com a matriz.
  • Certificação PMP
  • Experiência como PMO com o mínimo 5 anos.
  • Experiência em projetos SAP
  • Experiência em TI com foco em integrações de sistemas (ex: ERP ↔ sistemas legados ou plataformas locais).
  • Familiaridade com metodologias de gestão de projetos (ágil ou tradicional).
  • Excelentes habilidades organizacionais, de comunicação e de acompanhamento de múltiplas frentes.


Diferenciais Desejáveis:

  • CAPM, Scrum Master ou equivalente.
  • Experiência com ferramentas de gestão de projetos (MS Project, Jira, Excel avançado, Confluence, etc).
  • Participação anterior em projetos multinacionais ou ambientes com reporting global.
  • Vivência em controles internos ou auditoria de projetos.
  • Fluência em coreano será considerada um diferencial.
  • Fluência em espanhol será considerada um diferencial.


Escopo:

  • Acompanhar e controlar o cronograma dos projetos, com foco especial em iniciativas SAP e integrações de sistemas.
  • Conduzir e participar de reuniões com equipes internas e globais (incluindo HQ), garantindo alinhamento e avanço dos projetos.
  • Coletar e consolidar atualizações do time técnico e funcional, transformando essas informações em relatórios de status e dashboards executivos.
  • Controlar riscos, mudanças e pendências, promovendo a atuação proativa daequipe e a fluidez do projeto.
  • Apoiar na documentação de projetos: cronogramas, atas, templates, processos, indicadores e planos de ação.
  • Servir como elo entre áreas técnicas, funcionais e gestão, facilitando a comunicação e resolução de impedimentos.
  • Acompanhar entregas de fornecedores e consultores, garantindo que as metas sejam cumpridas com qualidade.
  • Apoiar na tradução de diretrizes globais (HQ) para a realidade local, especialmente no contexto SAP.
  • Participar de iniciativas de melhoria contínua nos processos do PMO e nas ferramentas de controle.

title: Product Owner – Marketing & Performance
description:
Essa oportunidade é para ACE Cortex e faz parte da holding ACE Ventures !


A ACE Cortex é uma consultoria de inovação que desenvolve soluções personalizadas para cada cliente, com um modelo de trabalho em parceria desde a descoberta até o desenvolvimento dos projetos. Com mais de 200 clientes e mais de 400 projetos de inovação realizados, a empresa aborda negócios como um todo, incluindo Estratégia, Pessoas, Core Business e Novos Negócios, oferecendo iniciativas de transformação para cada realidade e cultura.


Descrição da vaga


Como Product Owner – Marketing & Performance para o setor farmacêutico , você será responsável por liderar as squad de produto focando em campanhas para o público médico, com foco em conteúdo estratégico, jornadas personalizadas e geração de valor comercial em canais digitais. Atuará no cruzamento entre marketing, dados e tecnologia, garantindo que as soluções atendam às necessidades da indústria farmacêutica e da força de vendas, com impacto direto em awareness e prescrições.


Quando você for um(a) ACEr será responsável por:

  • Liderar a squad de produto com foco em performance, crescimento e entrega contínua de valor ;
  • Traduzir demandas de marketing, medical affairs e força de vendas em funcionalidades digitais alinhadas à jornada do público médico;
  • Mapear oportunidades de crescimento com base em dados, comportamento do usuário e objetivos de negócio, propondo novas funcionalidades e melhorias contínuas;
  • Priorizar e gerenciar o backlog do produto em parceria com o PO de produto, garantindo alinhamento com as metas de tração e evolução da plataforma;
  • Facilitar cerimônias ágeis , remover impedimentos e promover colaboração efetiva entre tecnologia, marketing, negócios e áreas reguladas;
  • Construir e manter a documentação do produto , incluindo user stories, jornadas, especificações funcionais e técnicas;
  • Definir e acompanhar KPIs e OKRs do produto , com foco em aquisição, engajamento, retenção e conversão;
  • Conduzir experimentos de growth com base em hipóteses de negócio, utilizando frameworks como A/B testing, loops virais e testes de ativação;
  • Analisar dados de uso, engajamento e conversão para embasar decisões e guiar a evolução do produto com base em evidências ;
  • Liderar integrações com portais médicos, CRMs e plataformas de conteúdo , garantindo eficiência técnica e relevância estratégica;
  • Ser o elo entre marketing, tecnologia, parceiros estratégicos e áreas reguladas , garantindo fluidez na comunicação e alinhamento de expectativas;
  • Atuar em proximidade com o sponsor farmacêutico , garantindo alinhamento estratégico, visibilidade de entregas e compliance com as normas do setor.


O você deve ter para ser um(a) ACEr:

  • Sólida experiência como Product Owner ou PM em produtos digitais, com atuação em squads ágeis;

title: Consultor SAP MM
description:
Alerta de vaga - 100% Remota


EcommIT, mais de 15 anos integrando o DNA EcommIT nas empresas líderes do mercado de meios de pagamento. Venha fazer parte do nosso time.



Vaga : CONSULTOR SAP MM

Modelo de trabalho: 100 % REMOTO

Modelo de contratação: PJ

Início : Junho

Período de Alocação: 11 Meses - Grandes chances de renovação

Idioma : Inglês avançado

Conhecimentos/Experiências que a pessoa precisa ter:


O consultor trabalhará na equipe de AMS para atendimento de tickets, solicitações de serviços, manutenções corretivas e evolutivas do sistema SAP em Produção.

Completará a equipe interna que possui conhecimento em diversos módulos SAP, nos quais poderá auxiliar em integrações.

Participará de reuniões de equipe e com o cliente para entender as demandas e suas priorizações.

Conhecimentos Técnicos Requeridos (detalhar por tópicos) Deverá ter experiência de no mínimo 7 anos como consultor SAP MM com localização Brasil.

Conhecimento técnico ABAP para realização de debug, análises, especificações e direcionamento aos desenvolvedores.

Conhecimento em ITIL e ferramentas de controle de tickets.

Comunicação eficaz, proatividade, solucionador de problemas, trabalho em equipe, senso analítico.

title: Windows System Administrator
description:
Overnight Shift: 11:00 PM to 8:00 AM EST


Job Summary:

Our client is seeking an experienced Windows Administrator to join their IT operations team during the overnight shift. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience managing Windows environments, troubleshooting system and network issues, and administering core Microsoft infrastructure services.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Manage and maintain Active Directory, including user and group administration, OU structure, and permissions.
  • Configure, manage, and troubleshoot Windows-based services such as DNS, DHCP, DFS, and Group Policy Objects (GPOs).
  • Perform root-cause analysis and resolve issues related to authentication and system performance.
  • Diagnose and resolve connectivity issues within a Windows environment.
  • Collaborate with other IT teams to escalate and resolve complex technical problems as needed.
  • Maintain accurate documentation of system configurations and operational procedures.


Qualifications:

  • Proven experience in Windows system administration.
  • Strong knowledge of Active Directory and related services.
  • Proficiency in managing DNS, DHCP, DFS, and GPOs.
  • Solid troubleshooting skills for authentication and performance issues in Windows environments.
  • Basic understanding of TCP/IP networking, VLANs, and IP subnetting.
  • Ability to work independently during overnight hours with minimal supervision.
  • Good communication skills and a proactive attitude.


Preferred Qualifications (not required but a plus):

  • Microsoft certifications (e.g., MCSA, MSCE).
  • Experience with remote desktop support tools.
  • Familiarity with scripting and automation (PowerShell is a plus).

description:

title: Desenvolvedor(a) de Oracle Senior
description:
Título do cargo: Desenvolvedor(a) Oracle Senior


Localização: São Paulo (Zona Sul) - Híbrido - 3 dias presenciais e 2 em home office


Sobre a Motivus


Na Motivus, acreditamos em liberar o potencial humano por meio de soluções inovadoras e de ponta. Com mais de 1.600 colaboradores em 5 países, oferecemos um amplo espectro de serviços de software e soluções digitais. Nossas equipes são dedicadas a impulsionar a sustentabilidade, expandir os limites da tecnologia e construir a próxima geração de soluções digitais de classe mundial que capacitam nossos clientes e geram impacto duradouro. Ao se juntar à nossa equipe, você trabalhará com profissionais visionários comprometidos em criar soluções inovadoras que moldam o futuro da indústria.


Desenvolvedor(a) Oracle Senior


Responsabilidades


Responsável por análise e desenvolvimento de sistemas em Oracle (SQL, PLSQL, Forms, Reports, Apex);

Responsável pela configuração, Build e Deploy nos ambientes;

Desenvolvimento de processos complexos, garantido integridade e performance no resultado; Construção e manutenção de malha batch (Shellscript e Control-M);

Monitoração de ambiente através de ferramentas específicas (ex.: Dynatrace);

DevSecOps (Integração contínua com Jenkins e Git);

Ferramentas colaborativas (Jira e Confluence);

Metodologia tradicional e ágil;



Requisitos Técnicos:

Experiência e conhecimento senior nas linguagens SQL e PL/SQL;

Conhecimento em Banco de Dados (Oracle) em ambiente linux;

Experiencia com sistemas críticos e bases com grande volumetria de dados;

Experiência prévia sistemas desenvolvidos em Forms/Reports/Apex;

Senso de urgência e disciplina;6 - Pontualidade;

Comprometimento


Requisitos Comportamentais:

Experiência e conhecimento senior nas linguagens SQL e PL/SQL;

Conhecimento em Banco de Dados (Oracle) em ambiente linux;

Experiencia com sistemas críticos e bases com grande volumetria de dados;

Experiência prévia sistemas desenvolvidos em Forms/Reports/Apex;

Senso de urgência e disciplina;

Pontualidade;

Comprometimento


Diferenciais:

Conhecimento no uso de ferramentas de monitoramento Dynatrace e Splunk;

Conhecimento em ferramentas de gestão de ambiente (ServiceNow );

Possuir conhecimentos nos produtos de Previdência Complementar;

Por Que Se Juntar a Nós?


Desenvolva sua Carreira: Na Motivus, você terá a oportunidade de expandir suas habilidades e assumir cargos de liderança em projetos diversificados.

Trabalhe com Tecnologias Emergentes: Esteja na vanguarda da inovação, trabalhando com tecnologias e metodologias de ponta.

Ambiente Colaborativo: Trabalhe com equipes talentosas que valorizam suas ideias e contribuições.

Aprendizado e Desenvolvimento: Oferecemos uma variedade de programas de L&D para ajudá-lo a progredir em sua carreira.

Abordagem Centrada no Cliente: Contribua para soluções que criam valor duradouro para clientes globais da Fortune 500.


Nossos Valores


Cultura de Inovação: Buscamos incessantemente a inovação, incentivando nossas equipes a explorar novas ideias e tecnologias.

Responsabilidade: Devolvemos às comunidades que nos apoiam e aos nossos clientes. Aprendizado e Desenvolvimento: Nossos colaboradores lideram, aprendem e crescem, apoiando a si mesmos e a nossos clientes.


Como se Candidatar:


Os candidatos interessados podem se inscrever enviando seu currículo e carta de apresentação para


A Motivus é um empregador que promove a igualdade de oportunidades e incentiva a diversidade e inclusão no local de trabalho.

title: Profissional Fullstack Node e React - Pleno
description:
Sobre a vaga


Código da vaga: 47782


Sobre a BRQ Digital


Há 31 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.


Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.


BRQ WAY


No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia!


É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.


Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.


  • Ei #fera em Node e React, chegou o momento de encarar um novo desafio em sua carreira! Venha ser um #ferabrq


- O que procuramos?


Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!


- O que você deve ter?


  • Experiência com ReactJS
  • Experiência com NodeJS
  • Integração com APIs RESTful
  • Conhecimento em integração com CRMs
  • Inglês avançado (comunicação com o time da França)


- O que temos pra te oferecer?


Mais do que um plano de carreira !


A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:


Carreira técnica: Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!


Carreira de Liderança: Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.


Experiência internacional: Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.


Empreendedorismo: De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.


- E os benefícios?


Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!


- Como é trabalhar na BRQ?


Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions


Curtiu? Então inscreva-se e venha para o melhor da Transformação Digital com a gente!

title: Analista de Software WEB AWS
description:
Responsabilidades e atribuições:

  • Desenvolver novas funcionalidades em sistemas web frontend/backend;
  • Apoiar à estimativa de custo de novas funcionalidades e infraestrutura;
  • Atuar na definição da arquitetura utilizada por nossas soluções;
  • Analisar a qualidade código através de code reviews;
  • Propor boas práticas na construção de software;
  • Desenvolvimento de testes unitários e de integração automatizados para sistemas Web;
  • Desenvolvimento de soluções web utilizando tecnologias em nuvem (AWS);
  • Desenvolvimento de testes automatizados;
  • Execução de atividades utilizando métodos ágeis (Scrum/Kanban);
  • Cooperar com o time para o review de código, definição de interfaces e atuar na proposta de soluções para os usuários/clientes;
  • Ser proativo, ter foco em resultados, boa capacidade para trabalhar com equipe distribuída.

Requisitos e qualificações:

  • Formação superior em Ciência da Computação, Sistemas de informação, Engenharia da Computação/Elétrica ou similar; Experiência com Web e Cloud;
  • Experiência com testes unitários e de integração;
  • Experiência com controle de versão usando Git;
  • Experiência com banco de dados relacional e não relacional;
  • Experiência com Arquitetura de micro serviços, containers, mensageria, serviços de dados

title: Senior Technical Recruiter
description:
Our company is seeking an experienced and motivated Senior Technical Recruiter to join our team.

As a senior member of our recruiting department, you will be responsible for identifying, attracting, and hiring top technical talent to support our company's growth and success.


Requirements:

  • Great communication skills
  • English: Proficient
  • 2 years of leading experience
  • 6 years of experience as a Technical Recruiter
  • Great organizational skills


Benefits:

  • 100% Remote
  • Paid Time Off (PTO)
  • Health Savings Account
  • Payments in USD


This is a 3-month contract with the potential for extension based on good performance.


Applications will ONLY be considered if you submit a 60-second introduction video answering the following question:

  • What is the secret to being a great technical recruiter that ChatGPT doesn't know?

Submit your video here: 


*Only our most Senior HR Manager will watch your video and delete it afterward. We review 100% of the videos submitted.*


Please do not apply if you do not meet our requirements, as we won’t be able to respond.

title: Google Ad Specialist
description:
Hey, Dingus!


Yeah, you heard that right. Dingus & Zazzy is looking for a Google Ad Specialist to join our growing team!


About Us

Dingus & Zazzy is a comprehensive digital marketing agency offering services for brands looking to expand their presence across a variety of digital platforms. Our business is expanding globally, and we need talented folks on our team to continue offering stellar service to our clients.

Running a company is a little like building a plane while flying it. There’s always too much to do; doing one thing means neglecting something else. You have to blog, but also be active on social media. You have to build websites and then optimize them for mobile. Email lists. Emails. Keywords. SEM. SEO. UX. UI. FML. OMG. That’s where we come in. We provide an unlimited get-shit-done subscription for our clients. And we need your help!


About the Role

Passionate about making Google Ads work its magic? We’re looking for a motivated individual to jump into the world of paid advertising. You’ll be key in creating and optimizing campaigns that help our clients connect with their audiences and achieve real results. If you’re curious about this position and you’re eager to learn and grow in a supportive environment, we’d love to hear from you.


Responsibilities

  • Understand or research different industries and strategize based on the different needs of clients
  • Audit past campaigns and draw conclusions based on them
  • Audit competitors’ ads and draw conclusions based on them
  • To be able to set up any type of campaign on Google Ads and keep up with the updates that Google makes to different campaigns.
  • To be able to perform relevant keyword research based on the client’s needs and strategy
  • Split the budget based on goals and campaign requirements
  • Understand the different types of audiences that Google supports and how to set them up
  • To be able to read metrics and provide optimization recommendations
  • To be able to use Google Tag Manager and set up proper tracking for each campaign
  • Test different ads, landing pages, and bidding options
  • Keep up with changes and new features in Google Ads


What You’ll Need

  • Real experience running and improving Google Ads campaigns
  • Solid understanding of Google Ads and campaign types (Search, Display, etc.)
  • Comfortable using Google Analytics and similar tools
  • Experience tracking conversions, measuring results, and analyzing data
  • Good organization and time management (good at managing your own time)
  • Solid communication
  • Google Ads certifications are a plus
  • Solid English skills, written and spoken
  • A degree in marketing or business is helpful, but not required, if you have the experience


Extra Points if You

  • Know how to use automation or bidding tools
  • Have used other ad platforms like Facebook or LinkedIn
  • Have worked at an agency before


Our operating hours are from 9 am to 5 pm MST, Monday to Friday.

Ready for the ride of your life? If you think you’re the perfect fit for the role, apply today!

  • Understand or research different industries and strategize based on the different needs of clients
  • Audit past campaigns and draw conclusions based on them
  • Audit competitors’ ads and draw conclusions based on them
  • To be able to set up any type of campaign on Google Ads and keep up with the updates that Google makes to different campaigns.
  • To be able to perform relevant keyword research based on the client’s needs and strategy
  • Split the budget based on goals and campaign requirements
  • Understand the different types of audiences that Google supports and how to set them up
  • To be able to read metrics and provide optimization recommendations
  • To be able to use Google Tag Manager and set up proper tracking for each campaign
  • Test different ads, landing pages, and bidding options
  • Keep up with changes and new features in Google Ads


What You’ll Need

  • Real experience running and improving Google Ads campaigns
  • Solid understanding of Google Ads and campaign types (Search, Display, etc.)
  • Comfortable using Google Analytics and similar tools
  • Experience tracking conversions, measuring results, and analyzing data
  • Good organization and time management (good at managing your own time)
  • Solid communication
  • Google Ads certifications are a plus
  • Solid English skills, written and spoken
  • A degree in marketing or business is helpful, but not required, if you have the experience


Extra Points if You

  • Know how to use automation or bidding tools
  • Have used other ad platforms like Facebook or LinkedIn
  • Have worked at an agency before


Our operating hours are from 9 am to 5 pm MST, Monday to Friday.

Ready for the ride of your life? If you think you’re the perfect fit for the role, apply today!

title: Senior .Net Azure Developer (REMOTE)
description:
ITTConnect is seeking a Senior .Net Developer (fullstack) with Azure experience to work remotely for a client in the US. This is a potentially long term position with a client that is a global leader in consulting, digital transformation, technology and engineering services with over 300,000 team members in nearly 50 countries. The end client is in the automotive distribution space.


Job location: Remote, work from home, anywhere in Brazil .


Only resumes in English will be reviewed.


MUST BE fluent in English. All interviews will be in English only.


Responsibilities :

  • Design, develop and maintain scalable web applications using .NET in an Azure environment, and related technologies.
  • Develop and maintain client-side web applications
  • Develop and maintain server-side web applications using ASP.NET, MVC, Web API, and related technologies
  • Integrate third-party services and APIs into web applications
  • Ensure high-quality code by writing automated tests, performing code reviews, and adhering to best practices


Requirements:

  • 10+ years of IT experience
  • Hands-on experience with Azure services as an Azure Full Stack Developer (Azure App Services, Functions, SQL Database, Key Vault, Azure Monitor, Azure Application Insights, Azure Storage, Azure Service Bus, etc.)
  • Strong experience with .NET Core, C#, and ASP.NET MVC/Web API
  • Knowledge of Kubernetes, Docker , and willingness to learn Dappr, Bicep, DevOps concepts
  • Proficiency in Git and version control systems
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines
  • Knowledge of Entity Framework
  • Strong problem-solving and debugging skills
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
  • Experience of working in a Agile environment

title: Especialista JAVA
description:
Sobre a Empresa


Há mais de 20 anos mercado, somos uma consultoria estratégica de Inovação e Transformação Digital. Nossa especialidade é impulsionar as demandas de nossos clientes, integrando processos, pessoas e tecnologia de alta performance.


Sobre o Cargo

Vaga: Especialista JAVA – 100% Remoto

Você é apaixonado(a) por tecnologia e quer fazer parte de um time que valoriza boas práticas, inovação e colaboração? Estamos em busca de profissionais especializados em Java com experiência sólida em back-end para atuar em um projeto desafiador, com foco em arquitetura moderna e soluções escaláveis.


Requisitos:

  • Experiência sólida com Java (preferência para versão 17 ).
  • Formação superior em áreas de TI.
  • Domínio de Spring Boot .
  • Experiência na criação e consumo de APIs REST .
  • Conhecimento em bancos de dados relacionais .
  • Vivência com arquitetura de microsserviços .
  • AWS (Secret Manager, Aurora PostgreSQL, Elasticache, SQS, S3).

Conhecimentos Desejáveis:


  • Experiência com Keycloak será um diferencial.


Modelo de trabalho:

100% remoto

CLT

Benefícios:

Vale Refeição - Cartão flash

title: Senior Field Support Analyst
description:
Job Description & Requirements:

The Desktop Technician will provide day-to-day local and remote desktop support, receive inbound calls, answer questions, troubleshoot, and document steps performed to resolve challenges with hardware, software, and application issues in a ticketing system. The employee will also need to facilitate customer resolution for calls and engage their supervisors and managers to ensure operational consistency across all shifts within the IT Support Center.

Responsibilities and Functions:

  • Provide first/second level contact and problem resolution for customer issues.
  • Work with vendors to remediate complex AV issues as needed.
  • Provide timely communication on issue status and resolution.
  • Maintain ticket updates for all reported incidents.
  • Install, upgrade, support, and troubleshoot Windows 7 to Windows 11, Microsoft Office 2010, Cisco Jabber, and other authorized desktop applications.
  • Support Apple PC users with basic knowledge of Mac operating systems.
  • Install, upgrade, support, and troubleshoot printers and computer hardware.
  • Perform general preventative maintenance tasks on computers, laptops, and printers.
  • Perform remedial repairs on desktops, laptops, printers, and any other authorized peripheral equipment.
  • Use diagnostic tools to troubleshoot problems associated with network connectivity and workstation hardware/software.
  • Have broad experience in IT with a basic understanding of networks, servers, audio/visual, smart devices, and telecoms.
  • Work in a project-based environment requiring flexibility and teamwork.
  • Perform other duties as assigned.

Required Minimum Qualifications and Skills:

  • CompTIA A+, Microsoft Certified Professional (MCP) or better.
  • Experience with Windows 7-11, Microsoft Active Directory, utilization of GPOs, MS Office 365, PC hardware installation and troubleshooting, enterprise anti-virus solutions, and helpdesk ticketing systems.
  • Mobile device management including iOS and Android devices, enterprise encryption solutions, Windows PC/laptop management via Active Directory.
  • Proven analytical, troubleshooting, and problem-solving skills.
  • Proven ability to multi-task, effectively determine priorities, and meet SLAs.
  • Excellent communication, relationship-building, and internal customer service skills.
  • Adaptable and flexible in a fast-changing industry and work environment.
  • Willing to work off-hours and weekends when required for projects or emergency support.
  • Languages: Advanced Portuguese and English.

Additional Responsibilities:

  • Provide support for on-call escalations and perform root cause analysis of given issues.
  • Independently resolve tickets within agreed SLA of ticket volume and time.
  • Adhere to quality standards, regulatory requirements, and company policies.
  • Engage in value-adding activities such as knowledge base updates and management, training freshers, and coaching analysts.
  • Ensure a positive customer experience and CSAT through First Call Resolution and minimum rejected resolutions/reopen cases.

title: Senior Talent Acquisition/Recruiter
description:
About the Company


SHEIN is a global online fashion and lifestyle retailer, offering SHEIN branded apparel and products from a global network of vendors, all at affordable prices. Headquartered in Singapore, SHEIN remains committed to making the beauty of fashion accessible to all, promoting its industry-leading, on-demand production methodology, for a smarter, future-ready industry. Founded in 2012, SHEIN has more than 16,000 employees operating from offices around the world and continues to expand operations globally. Join SHEIN and be the future!



About the Role

Responsible for the South America Fulfillment Region, to achieve end-to-end recruitment tasks, efficiently and effectively delivering high-quality results from a business perspective and driving business success.


Responsibilities

  • Manage and drive a full recruitment cycle for various business groups across Logistics, Warehouse, Production, own the full recruiting cycle from setting recruitment intake meetings to job offers in Brazil.
  • Data-driven and complete recruitment data tracking and analysis or recruitment report as required.
  • Partnering with internal and external stakeholders, continuously keep the employer brand attractive.
  • Work closely with hiring managers to acquire the updated hiring needs and find the best way for the business to hire the best people.
  • Continuously identify improvement on Talent Acquisition excellence in terms of process, policy, system etc., to elevate both recruitment quality and efficiency.
  • Work closely with cross-functional teams, participate in HR projects cooperating with cross border teams.


Qualifications

  • 4 or plus years of full-cycle recruiting experience in a fast-paced, high-growth environment, experienced in making offers, offer negotiation, talent mapping, be good at handling multiple tasks.
  • Experience hiring roles across Logistics, Warehouse, and Production, will be a plus if you have experiences working in e-commerce/retail/fashion company.
  • Experience in enhancing corporate culture.
  • Fluency in English, English is a must.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with good professionalism and friendliness.
  • Passionate for approaching new things, building teams and keep patient in doing shaping, from 0-1.
  • Having active and data-driven with a growth mindset, to learn quick, be flexible in such a fluid and changing circumstance.



Location:

  • Guarulhos office: GLP Guarulhos II - R. Concretex, 800 - Cumbica
  • Sao Paulo office：Av. Brig. Faria Lima, 4285 - Itaim Bibi

title: Senior Talent Acquisition/Recruiter
description:
About the Company


SHEIN is a global online fashion and lifestyle retailer, offering SHEIN branded apparel and products from a global network of vendors, all at affordable prices. Headquartered in Singapore, SHEIN remains committed to making the beauty of fashion accessible to all, promoting its industry-leading, on-demand production methodology, for a smarter, future-ready industry. Founded in 2012, SHEIN has more than 16,000 employees operating from offices around the world and continues to expand operations globally. Join SHEIN and be the future!



About the Role

Responsible for the South America Fulfillment Region, to achieve end-to-end recruitment tasks, efficiently and effectively delivering high-quality results from a business perspective and driving business success.


Responsibilities

  • Manage and drive a full recruitment cycle for various business groups across Logistics, Warehouse, Production, own the full recruiting cycle from setting recruitment intake meetings to job offers in Brazil.
  • Data-driven and complete recruitment data tracking and analysis or recruitment report as required.
  • Partnering with internal and external stakeholders, continuously keep the employer brand attractive.
  • Work closely with hiring managers to acquire the updated hiring needs and find the best way for the business to hire the best people.
  • Continuously identify improvement on Talent Acquisition excellence in terms of process, policy, system etc., to elevate both recruitment quality and efficiency.
  • Work closely with cross-functional teams, participate in HR projects cooperating with cross border teams.


Qualifications

  • 4 or plus years of full-cycle recruiting experience in a fast-paced, high-growth environment, experienced in making offers, offer negotiation, talent mapping, be good at handling multiple tasks.
  • Experience hiring roles across Logistics, Warehouse, and Production, will be a plus if you have experiences working in e-commerce/retail/fashion company.
  • Experience in enhancing corporate culture.
  • Fluency in English, English is a must.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with good professionalism and friendliness.
  • Passionate for approaching new things, building teams and keep patient in doing shaping, from 0-1.
  • Having active and data-driven with a growth mindset, to learn quick, be flexible in such a fluid and changing circumstance.



Location:

  • Guarulhos office: GLP Guarulhos II - R. Concretex, 800 - Cumbica
  • Sao Paulo office：Av. Brig. Faria Lima, 4285 - Itaim Bibi

title: Network/Cloud Consultant
description: Come to one of the biggest IT Services companies in the world!! Here you can transform your career! Why to join TCS? Here at TCS we believe that people make the difference, thats why we live a culture of unlimited learning full of opportunities for improvement and mutual development. The ideal scenario to expand ideas through the right tools, contributing to our success in a collaborative environment. We are looking for Principal Consultant - Network/Cloud, who wants to learn and transform his career. In this role you will:We are seeking a Principal Consultant with experience providing network strategy and assessment consulting services and designing and implementing large-scale multi-national transformation projects.The Principal Consultant will be engaged as both the Consultant to provide advisory services (Strategic Assessments) to global clients and a Technical Project Lead across muti-vendor technologies, utilizing their experience across the range or projects, to provide expertise in:DiscoveryRequirements gathering (business, technical and financial)Current State ArchitectureSolution Alternatives DevelopmentRecommendations and Roadmap DevelopmentDesign, Architecture and IntegrationMigration planningImplementation leadership governance.The Principal Consultant should have a proven track record of team leadership, strong business acumen skills, business case generation, financial analysis, polished oral and written communication, documentation, and presentation skills. Also, he/she should be well-rounded and adept at leading consultative engagements, workshops, assessing network environments, and architecting designs for data center and network solutions, and creating meaningful, cohesive deliverables. In addition, the Principal Consultant should be experienced in providing presales support of the consulting and professional service engagements, able to articulate value and produce suitable materials (SOW/Proposals/Presentations) to support the growth of the team in LATAM/APAC.RequirementsThe Principal Consultant is expected to become quickly accustomed to and follow our industry leading, repeatable project methodology, leveraging appropriate tools templates, proactively participating in status meetings, providing project updates, chairing critical issue discussions etc. In addition, the Principal Consultant will be expected to attend ad hoc project meetings, lead scheduled design workshops/discussions, prepare and deliver executive summary presentations, attend project closure meetings, including providing key input to lessons learned sessions. The Principal Consultant will also be expected to complete all administration, reports and training on time and as directed. The Principal Consultant should also stay abreast of the latest marketing trends or chief concerns in their profession and participate in National Practice operations, process improvement and training calls, taking accountability for their own professional development and career growth, as well as sharing knowledge with others. The following is a list of other responsibilities that the Principal Consultant may/will be expected to provide the course of delivering their role:• Lead all technical aspects of delivery, ensuring customer satisfaction and accurate timekeeping for billing purposes on projects where the Solution Architect is the only technical resource or the lead technical resource.• Collaborate with team members, providing consulting services and managing project activities from client identification through final invoicing.• Demonstrate broad product knowledge within a specific discipline to customers.• Work independently on highly complex projects or as part of a team as assigned by the project leader.• Exhibit expert knowledge of principles, theories, and concepts in the applicable discipline, along with a high level of working knowledge in other related fields. Assist less experienced peers when needed.• Perform work under minimal direction, demonstrating the ability to navigate and lead in complex project environments.• As a member of a team of advanced infrastructure consultants and lead consultants, use in-depth knowledge of networking to design and implement solutions for our clients.• Take responsibility for consulting project activities from client identification through final invoicing.• Act as the subject matter expert within a specific discipline, providing insights and solutions based on extensive experience and knowledge.• Lead an engagement team, consisting of other Consultants and/or Sr. Consultant, or may be the sole consulting resource on a project.• Technical responsibilities include problem identification, system architecture definition, hardware/software specification and/or design, implementation, testing, client training, and deployment.• Serve as a mentor or coach, guiding less experienced peers and fostering a collaborative and learning environment.• Create recommendations and implement new methods, techniques, and/or procedures to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.A successful candidate will have a broad range of the following types of technical experience:Networking and Internetworking:• Thorough understanding of internetworking technologies and how technologies are deployed in complex, global networks. Experience with IPv4 and IPv6.• Experience in WAN and SD-WAN planning, design, and deployment. Familiarity with SD WAN, MPLS, Hybrid WAN, Internet Complex, Ethernet, Internet VPN is desirable.• Proficiency in MPLS Integration, including MPLS equipment transport selection, QoS, MPLS IP Routing, and MPLS migration planning/transition.• Experience with large campus LAN (including wireless) planning, design, and deployment.Equipment and Technology:• Experience in equipment selection, sizing, and detailed engineered design.• Experience with network virtualization technologies.• Strong knowledge of features, functionality, and configurations for Cisco Systems, Nortel, Juniper, Extreme Networks, etc. (specifically campus LAN, WiFi etc)• Knowledge and experience with SDN, Juniper, Velocloud, VMware/Virtualization, and/or IoT is also a significant plus.Data Centre Expertise:• Proficiency in core, distribution, and segmentation. Experience in analysis, design, engineering, and deployment of DC core networks built on legacy architectures and fabric-enabled architectures.• Experience with Cisco ACI SDN technologies and/or other SDDC technologies is highly desirable.Security and Firewall Design:• Experience with firewall design, configuration, network segmentation, and implementation, such as Cisco ASA, CheckPoint, Fortinet, etc.• Understanding of load-balancing, F5 experience is a plus.IP Routing and Addressing:• Experience in IP routing planning, design, and deployment. Familiarity with OSPF, BGP, M-BGP, EIGRP capabilities, and corresponding configurations.• Understanding of NAT, DNS/DHCP, Address Summarization as it impacts IP addressing and IP routing.Cloud Technologies and SASE:• Experience with cloud technologies, including hybrid-cloud, AWS and/or Azure, is very desirable.• Familiarity with SASE concepts and technologies is very desirableWhat do we offer? TCS Benefits – Brazil:Health insuranceDental PlanLife insuranceTransportation vouchersMeal/Food VoucherChildcare assistanceGympassTCS Cares – free 0800 that provides psychological assistance (24 hrs/day), legal, social and financial assistance to associatesPartnership with SESCReimbursement of CertificationsFree TCS Learning Portal – Online courses and live trainingInternational experience opportunityDiscount Partnership with Universities and Language SchoolsBring Your Buddy – By referring people you become eligible to receive a bonus for each hireTCS Gems – Recognition for performanceXcelerate – Free Mentoring Career PlatformTata Consultancy Services is an equal opportunity employer, our commitment to diversity inclusion drives our efforts to provide equal opportunity to all candidates who meet our required knowledge competency needs, irrespective of any socio-economic background, race, color, national origin, religion, sex, gender identity/expression , age, marital status, disability, sexual orientation or any others. We encourage anyone interested to build a career in TCS to participate in our recruitment selection process.At Tata Consultancy Services we promote an inclusive culture, we always work for equity. This applies to Gender, People with Disabilities, LGBTQIA+, Religion, Race, Ethnicity. All our opportunities are based on these principles. We think of different actions of inclusion and social responsibility, in order to build a TCS that respects each person. Our motto is Inclusion without exception. At TATA Consultancy Services we promote an inclusive culture, we always work for equity. This applies to Gender, People with Disabilities, LGBTQIA+, Religion, Race, Ethnicity. All our opportunities are based on these principles. We think of different actions of inclusion and social responsibility, in order to build a TCS that respects individuality. Come to be a TCSer!#Buildingonbelief

The following is a list of other responsibilities that the Principal Consultant may/will be expected to provide the course of delivering their role:• Lead all technical aspects of delivery, ensuring customer satisfaction and accurate timekeeping for billing purposes on projects where the Solution Architect is the only technical resource or the lead technical resource.• Collaborate with team members, providing consulting services and managing project activities from client identification through final invoicing.• Demonstrate broad product knowledge within a specific discipline to customers.• Work independently on highly complex projects or as part of a team as assigned by the project leader.• Exhibit expert knowledge of principles, theories, and concepts in the applicable discipline, along with a high level of working knowledge in other related fields. Assist less experienced peers when needed.• Perform work under minimal direction, demonstrating the ability to navigate and lead in complex project environments.• As a member of a team of advanced infrastructure consultants and lead consultants, use in-depth knowledge of networking to design and implement solutions for our clients.• Take responsibility for consulting project activities from client identification through final invoicing.• Act as the subject matter expert within a specific discipline, providing insights and solutions based on extensive experience and knowledge.• Lead an engagement team, consisting of other Consultants and/or Sr. Consultant, or may be the sole consulting resource on a project.• Technical responsibilities include problem identification, system architecture definition, hardware/software specification and/or design, implementation, testing, client training, and deployment.• Serve as a mentor or coach, guiding less experienced peers and fostering a collaborative and learning environment.• Create recommendations and implement new methods, techniques, and/or procedures to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.A successful candidate will have a broad range of the following types of technical experience:Networking and Internetworking:• Thorough understanding of internetworking technologies and how technologies are deployed in complex, global networks. Experience with IPv4 and IPv6.• Experience in WAN and SD-WAN planning, design, and deployment. Familiarity with SD WAN, MPLS, Hybrid WAN, Internet Complex, Ethernet, Internet VPN is desirable.• Proficiency in MPLS Integration, including MPLS equipment transport selection, QoS, MPLS IP Routing, and MPLS migration planning/transition.• Experience with large campus LAN (including wireless) planning, design, and deployment.Equipment and Technology:• Experience in equipment selection, sizing, and detailed engineered design.• Experience with network virtualization technologies.• Strong knowledge of features, functionality, and configurations for Cisco Systems, Nortel, Juniper, Extreme Networks, etc. (specifically campus LAN, WiFi etc)• Knowledge and experience with SDN, Juniper, Velocloud, VMware/Virtualization, and/or IoT is also a significant plus.Data Centre Expertise:• Proficiency in core, distribution, and segmentation. Experience in analysis, design, engineering, and deployment of DC core networks built on legacy architectures and fabric-enabled architectures.• Experience with Cisco ACI SDN technologies and/or other SDDC technologies is highly desirable.Security and Firewall Design:• Experience with firewall design, configuration, network segmentation, and implementation, such as Cisco ASA, CheckPoint, Fortinet, etc.• Understanding of load-balancing, F5 experience is a plus.IP Routing and Addressing:• Experience in IP routing planning, design, and deployment. Familiarity with OSPF, BGP, M-BGP, EIGRP capabilities, and corresponding configurations.• Understanding of NAT, DNS/DHCP, Address Summarization as it impacts IP addressing and IP routing.Cloud Technologies and SASE:• Experience with cloud technologies, including hybrid-cloud, AWS and/or Azure, is very desirable.• Familiarity with SASE concepts and technologies is very desirableWhat do we offer? TCS Benefits – Brazil:Health insuranceDental PlanLife insuranceTransportation vouchersMeal/Food VoucherChildcare assistanceGympassTCS Cares – free 0800 that provides psychological assistance (24 hrs/day), legal, social and financial assistance to associatesPartnership with SESCReimbursement of CertificationsFree TCS Learning Portal – Online courses and live trainingInternational experience opportunityDiscount Partnership with Universities and Language SchoolsBring Your Buddy – By referring people you become eligible to receive a bonus for each hireTCS Gems – Recognition for performanceXcelerate – Free Mentoring Career PlatformTata Consultancy Services is an equal opportunity employer, our commitment to diversity inclusion drives our efforts to provide equal opportunity to all candidates who meet our required knowledge competency needs, irrespective of any socio-economic background, race, color, national origin, religion, sex, gender identity/expression , age, marital status, disability, sexual orientation or any others. We encourage anyone interested to build a career in TCS to participate in our recruitment selection process.At Tata Consultancy Services we promote an inclusive culture, we always work for equity. This applies to Gender, People with Disabilities, LGBTQIA+, Religion, Race, Ethnicity. All our opportunities are based on these principles. We think of different actions of inclusion and social responsibility, in order to build a TCS that respects each person. Our motto is Inclusion without exception. At TATA Consultancy Services we promote an inclusive culture, we always work for equity. This applies to Gender, People with Disabilities, LGBTQIA+, Religion, Race, Ethnicity. All our opportunities are based on these principles. We think of different actions of inclusion and social responsibility, in order to build a TCS that respects individuality. Come to be a TCSer!#Buildingonbelief

title: Ortodontista
description:
Estamos ampliando nossa equipe e abrindo seleção para especialista em Ortodontia e que já trabalhe ou tenha interesse em trabalhar com alinhadores ortodônticos.

Além dos requisitos técnicos precisa ser um profissional aberto para trabalhar em equipe e busque crescimento constante.

title: Auxiliar de Cozinha
description:
O que é ser GRAND?

‌

Ser GRAND é viver todos os dias movido pelo propósito de "cuidar das pessoas para que elas possam ser o seu melhor".

‌

Nossa promessa está em entregarmos grandes experiências para nossos clientes, colegas e para a sociedade baseada em nossos valores.

‌

· Respeitamos as pessoas pois cremos que ser inclusivo e valorizar os diversos pontos de vista nos fazem crescer juntos;

· Ser íntegro nos torna diferentes pois estamos prontos para falar e aceitar a verdade, honrando com os compromissos, responsabilidades e orgulho;

· Somos empáticos pois antes de qualquer coisa, nos colocamos no lugar das pessoas com compaixão e honestidade;

· Buscamos a todo instante ver as coisas de uma forma diferente, nos tornando criativos, curiosos e experimentando sem medo. Acreditamos que as falhas existem e são elas que nos levam ao sucesso mais cedo;

· Prezamos por um ambiente de descontração, rimos alto e geramos a alegria em nosso ambiente de trabalho. Cultivar um ambiente saudável, alegre e de bem estar é a chave para um serviço de excelência!

‌

Junte-se a uma das organizações mais amadas e consolidadas do mercado hoteleiro no mundo!

‌

SOBRE A VAGA:

‌

Principais Responsabilidades:

‌

  • Desejável ter conhecimento técnico básico de cortes, e manipulação de alimentos.
  • Auxiliar nos prepararos dos pratos de acordo com o cardápio e os padrões do hotel;
  • Garantir a qualidade, apresentação e sabor dos alimentos servidos;
  • Seguir normas de segurança alimentar, higiene e boas práticas de manipulação;
  • Apoiar no controle de insumos, estoque e validade de produtos;
  • Manter a limpeza e organização do ambiente de trabalho;


Requisitos da vaga:

  • ‌Disponibilidade de horário;
  • Desejável experiência com cozinha quente e fria.
  • Amar, Cuidar e Servir!

‌

Oferecemos uma lista completa de benefícios:

‌

  • Plano de Saúde para o colaborador e até dois dependentes;
  • Plano Odontológico opcional para o colaborador e dependentes;
  • Seguro de Vida;
  • Vale Transporte de acordo com as suas necessidades;
  • Auxílio creche;
  • Uniforme lavado e passado em nossa lavanderia;
  • Café Sampa: O melhor restaurante, exclusivo para as refeições de nossos colaboradores;
  • Focamos no apoio a saúde mental através de uma psicóloga que faz atendimentos presenciais;
  • Gympass para apoio a saúde física;
  • Day off no dia do seu aniversário;
  • Desconto nos serviços oferecidos pelo hotel (Restaurantes e SPA);
  • 12 noites cortesia por ano em hotéis da Hyatt pelo mundo.

‌

E aí, que tal ser GRAND? Cadastre-se e boa sorte!!

title: Pessoa Engenheira de Software
description:
POR QUE TRABALHAR CONOSCO


A Onze é uma das nossas start-ups e está reinventando a Previdência Privada. Somos a primeira PrevTech do Brasil, trazendo uma proposta totalmente digital para um mercado tradicionalmente analógico. Acreditamos que a tecnologia e a inovação podem ter impacto real na maneira com que as pessoas se preparam financeiramente para o futuro. Além de uma empresa de tecnologia, somos também uma gestora de investimentos, com fundos de previdência privada eficientes e desenhados para trazer o melhor retorno com o menor custo possível – como a Previdência deve ser. Nossos fundos, plataforma tecnológica e soluções de saúde financeira tem como objetivo maximizar a acumulação eficiente de patrimônio, um dos maiores desafios do povo Brasileiro.


O TIME

O time da Onze é distribuído em pequenos times ágeis que valorizam a cultura onde cada pessoa desenvolvedora tem autonomia para participar de todo o processo de desenvolvimento, inclusive as etapas de concepção de ideias. Priorizamos e incentivamos que as pessoas se desenvolvam tanto tecnicamente como em outras áreas de competência como comunicação e liderança. Temos orgulho de trabalhar na primeira fintech em previdência privada do Brasil e temos a inovação tecnológica e criatividade como uma das bases do nosso dia a dia.



A OPORTUNIDADE

Você irá participar diretamente das etapas de arquitetura, desenvolvimento, testes automatizados, code review e deploy de funcionalidades em sistemas na nuvem. Você vai trabalhar com tecnologias e metodologias de ponta em aplicações que demandam alta disponibilidade, baixa latência e escalabilidade em um ambiente de desenvolvimento que prioriza eficiência, testes, qualidade e alta entrega de valor.



O QUE PROCURAMOS

  • Pessoas das áreas de Ciência da Computação, Sistemas de Informação ou áreas relacionadas que sejam proativas e apaixonadas por tecnologia;
  • Conhecimento em linguagens de programação. Ex: Go, Java, Python, C# (gostamos bastante de Go, se não souber, você pode aprender aqui!);
  • Conhecimento em banco de dados relacionais (ex: MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc);
  • Experiência em computação em nuvem (de preferência AWS);
  • Experiência em arquitetura de solução;
  • Valorizar qualidade e código limpo;
  • Conhecimento em testes automatizados;
  • Interesse em desenvolver soft skills como comunicação e liderança;
  • Inglês intermediário/Avançado



O QUE OFERECEMOS


  • Trabalhe em um ambiente dinâmico de start-up com o apoio de uma empresa líder em tecnologia localizada nos Estados Unidos;
  • Acompanhamento e gestão de carreira com ciclos de avaliação semestrais estruturados e feedbacks recorrentes;
  • Planos de Saúde e Odontológico;
  • Plano de Saúde para Pet;
  • Previdência privada;
  • Plano de saúde financeira incluindo consultorias individualizadas com profissionais certificados;
  • Benefício refeição/flexível da Swile;
  • Incentivo educacional anual em formato de reembolso;
  • Acesso à plataforma da Udemy;
  • Bônus anual de acordo com a performance;
  • Voucher ifood no mês de aniversário;
  • Gympass/Totalpass;
  • Empresa cidadã
  • Modelo CLT - remoto;



LGPD - aviso de privacidade para pessoas candidatas -

  • Plano de saúde financeira incluindo consultorias individualizadas com profissionais certificados;
